dashboard_history_restoration_successful: Your DNS zone is currently being restored... You can track progress in the ‘Recent tasks’ tab. The propagation will be complete depending on the TTL (takes a maximum of 24 hours).
dashboard_history_restore_modal_content: Do you want to restore the {{date}} backup?
dashboard_history_restore_modal_warning_: Important! The current zone will be deleted. The new zone selected will be restored
dashboard_history_restore_modal_info_mes: The reset on the DNS zone will take a few moments. Please note that the change may take up to 24 hours to propagate.
